item.description:
Supposedly we're in for some great weather this weekend so even though it's Easter, I thought I'd see how many riders might be interested in a short ride - the route is ~15 miles and closer (Foxboro/Sharon). It's the shorter route from the 30-miler we did last year. (Hint: Click on the link that follows for a route map) This route will go through Foxboro/Sharon/Mansfield -- those of you who joined us last time will remember the hillS (yes, plural) on Oak Street.

So after the Saturday morning egg hunts and before stuffing your face with peeps and chocolate bunnies, join me for some fresh outdoor air.

And depending on who shows, maybe we'll grab some celebratory drinks at Waxy's :-)
item.name: "Hop" onto your bike for a pre-Easter ride --
